message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on abstractive summarization. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper proposes a novel approach to improve the quality of abstractive summarization using a concept pointer network. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper uses a machine learning model (pointer generator sequence-to-sequence model) and proposes a novel method of distantly-supervised learning guided by reference summaries and testing set. 
4. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a possible category as the paper deals with summarization of large amounts of text data and improving the quality of summaries. 
5. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible category as the paper uses a neural network model for abstractive summarization.
